bibl.title: Catalogue of the Greek and Latin Papyri in the John Rylands Library, Manchester. Vol. IV: Documents of the Ptolemaic, Roman, and Byzantine Periods (Nos 552-717)
bibl.seg: Roberts Colin H. and Eric G. Turner, Catalogue of the Greek and Latin Papyri in the John Rylands Library, Manchester. Vol. IV: Documents of the Ptolemaic, Roman, and Byzantine Periods (Nos 552-717).
Manchester, Manchester University Press, 1952, 4°, xvii-211 pp. et 6 pll.

C.R. par André Bataille, REG 66 (1953) pp. 450-453. - Harold I. Bell, JHS 73 (1953) pp. 164-165. - Pierre Benoît, RBibl 61 (1954) pp. 478-480. - Alvaro d'Ors, Emerita 21 (1953) pp. 339-345. - Jacqueline Lallemand, Byzantion 24 (1954) pp. 319-324. - Naphtali Lewis, CP 49 (1954) pp. 267-269. - Bror Olsson, Gnomon 24 (1952) pp. 438-439. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 28 (1953) No. 55, pp. 156-162. - B.R. Rees, CR N.S., 3 (1953) pp. 176-178. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 71 (1954) pp. 390-398.
